name: Akai Ito
description: This is a game made in a 48h Jam, with the theme "Joined Together". You control two girls and change who you are controling by "Q", catch boxes and drop with "E", your goal is to make both drop the boxes in the correct spots, so the bridge will open and you'll get closer to your partner, while being pulled by the Akai Ito, a red thread that connect people who are destined to be lovers.
